title: Duke Nukem Forever, v1.0 (Build 244) + 3 DLCs
body:
Duke Nukem Forever, v1.0 (Build 244) + 3 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, First-person, 3D
Companies: 3D Realms, Gearbox Software, 2K Games
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI6
Original Size: 5 GB
Repack Size: from 2.8 GB

 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x / KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Fixed setup for FRA/ESP/GER/ITA installations

Installer in torrent on filehosters contains error,  it doesn’t “see” optional language files even when they are present in repack folder. Get this new setup to fix the problem. Sorry.

http://www4.zippyshare.com/v/VmqF3Z8u/file.html

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Duke.Nukem.Forever.Complete-PLAZA ISO release: plaza-duke.nukem.forever.complete.iso (5,353,013,248 bytes)
  • Optional Russian localization added
  • All released DLCs included and activated, some stuff (like “My Digs” room) is also unlocked by PLAZA crack
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature: you may skip downloading of extra videos (trailers, credits, etc.) and unnecessary languages
  • Smaller archive size (compressed from 5 to 2.8~3.8 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 5-8 minutes
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 9 GB
  • Use “language.changer.exe” in game’s “System” folder to change the game language, if you installed optional languages

Game Description

The King is Back!

Cocked, loaded and ready for action, Duke delivers epic ass-kicking, massive weapons, giant explosions and pure unadulterated fun!

Put on your shades and step into the boots of Duke Nukem. The alien hordes are invading and only Duke can save the world. Pig cops, alien shrink rays and enormous alien bosses can’t stop this epic hero from accomplishing his goal: to save the world, save the babes and to be a bad-ass while doing it.

The King arrives with an arsenal of over-the-top weapons, non-stop action, and unprecedented levels of interactivity. With hours and hours of action, and a range of bodacious multiplayer modes, rest assured knowing the fun goes on and on.

Included DLCs

  • Pre-Order Bonus Pack
  • Hail to the Icons Parody Pack
  • The Doctor Who Cloned Me
You can skip downloading of files you don’t need. Here is the list of such files:
  • setup-fitgirl-optional-french.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-optional-german.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-optional-italian.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-optional-spanish.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-optional-videos.bin
